title: 序列帧动画制作
author: i逗比
txt_content:
如题嗷

以前看到教程有找不到了

replies.author: xiang_xge
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=271536
图似乎崩了，不过对照软件是可以看懂的

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content: 直接用画图软件 (Photoshop/SAI) 来做就行

replies.txt_content:
